entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
